mapper.select: select * from tbl_ticket ticket left outer join tbl_room_timeline timeline on ticket.timeline_no = timeline.timeline_no left outer join tbl_room_seat seat on ticket.seat_no = seat.seat_no where ticket.ticket_no = #{ticket_no}

select a.ticket_no, a.user_no, a.ticket_regdate , b.movie_begin_date, b.movie_finish_date, b.movie_code, c.cinema_name, d.seat_x, d.seat_y, e.room_type_name, f.room_name, f.room_floor, g.movie_name, g.movie_image_name from tbl_ticket a, tbl_room_timeline b, tbl_cinema c, tbl_room_seat d, tbl_room_type e, tbl_cinema_room f, tbl_movie g where a.timeline_no = b.timeline_no and b.cinema_no = c.cinema_no and b.room_no = d.room_no and b.room_type_code = e.room_type_code and b.cinema_no = f.cinema_no and b.room_no = f.room_no and b.movie_code = g.movie_code and a.user_no = #{user_no}

select a.ticket_no, a.user_no, a.ticket_regdate , b.movie_begin_date, b.movie_finish_date, b.movie_code, c.cinema_name, d.seat_x, d.seat_y, e.room_type_name, f.room_name, f.room_floor, g.movie_name, g.movie_image_name from tbl_ticket a, tbl_room_timeline b, tbl_cinema c, tbl_room_seat d, tbl_room_type e, tbl_cinema_room f, tbl_movie g where a.timeline_no = b.timeline_no and b.cinema_no = c.cinema_no and b.room_no = d.room_no and b.room_type_code = e.room_type_code and b.cinema_no = f.cinema_no and b.room_no = f.room_no and b.movie_code = g.movie_code and a.user_no = #{user_no} and a.ticket_no = #{ticket_no}
